Commands.Mach Wave: 3-HIT BRV attack.  Grants 1 stack of Conqueror's Power for 2 turns (max stacks is 3).  Turns to Mach Wave+ while Conqueror's Power III is active.  Conqueror's Power lowers all enemies' Attack.
Commands.Force of Will: 2-HIT BRV+HP Attack.  Cancels target's BREAK status.  Follows up with a 4-HIT BRV+HP Attack.  Grants Consul's Wisdom for 3 turns.  BREAK Bonus is only applied once.   While Consul's Wisdom is active:  - Turns BRV Attack to Kick.  - Turns HP Attack to Rush.  While Conqueror's Power III is active:  - Turns Force of Will to Force of Will+.  Consul's Wisdom raises all party members' Max BRV and Attack.
Commands.Tree of Sephira: 4-HIT AoE BRV+HP attack.  HP damage is divided equally amongst all enemies.  Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target.  BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV.  After use, Mach Wave and Force of Will's use count recovers by 1 (up to the initial values).  Turns to Tree of Sephira+ while Conqueror's Power III is active.
Commands.Tree of Sephira+: while Conqueror's Power III is active

Passives.Mach Wave Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Mach Wave/+.
Passives.Critical Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with critical hits.
Passives.Force of Will Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Force of Will/+.
Passives.Break Bonus Up: Slightly raises Break Bonus earned after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Mach Wave Charge: Increases Mach Wave's max uses by 1.
Passives.Break Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Force of Will Charge: Increases Force of Will's max uses by 1.
Passives.Imperial Consul: Slightly raises Max BRV and Attack while buffed.
Passives.Buff Attack&Speed Up: Moderately raises Attack and slightly raises Speed while buffed.
Passives.Mach Wave Extend: Increases Mach Wave's max uses by 1.When using Mach Wave/+:- Tremendously raises its potency.- BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV.- Triggers an HP attack after use.
Passives.Buff Boost&Speed Up: Moderately raises Max BRV and Speed while buffed.
Passives.Force of Will Extend: Increases Force of Will's max uses by 1.When using Force of Will/+:- Tremendously raises its potency.- Extends the duration of Consul's Wisdom by 4 turns.Moderately raises the potency of Kick/+ and Rush/+.When using Force of Will, Kick or Rush:- Grants 1 stack of Conqueror's Power for 2 turns.

Weapons.Sephira CP: 15: When using Mach Wave/+:- Raises its potency.When using Mach Wave:- Grants an additional stack of Conqueror's Power.
Weapons.Enigma CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability Tree of Sephira.
Weapons.Corruption CP: 35: When using Force of Will/+:- Raises its potency.- Improves the effects of Consul's Wisdom and extends its duration.Raises the potency of Kick/+ and Rush/+.
